resources.string:
Thank you for using OpenTrackEditor !

 OpenTrackEditor started as a student project and has grown into an open-source tool thanks to all of your feedback. We're constantly working to improve your experience, but we know that sometimes the feature you need might not be available yet!

 If that happens, we'd love to hear from you. Send us an email with your feedback or suggestions, or let us know if you encounter any bugs. Your input helps us make OpenTrackEditor even better.




Want to help maintain and shape the future of this tool?
